song_lyrics: Jaḍbuddhi jīva, prabhupadne īchchhe to kar santnu pārkhu;
Rang pītpaṇe, sonu ne pittaḷ nav hoye ek sarkhu...
Tu bhulīsh mā ḍhole bhagve... jaḍbuddhi 1
Ang bhasma ghase shir jūt jaṭā,
Māhī kām krodh mad moh ghaṭā... jaḍbuddhi 2
Bhaj tene je Hari pragaṭ bhaje... jaḍbuddhi 3
Jene kām krodh mad moh naī,
Kahe Brahmānand so sant saī... jaḍbuddhi 4
title: Jaḍbuddhi jīva prabhupadne īchchhe

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-447: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
